    • Method Detail

      • addButtonClicked

        public void addButtonClicked()
        Method to call when "Add" button is clicked. Starts add new album dialog.

      • deleteButtonClicked

        public void deleteButtonClicked()
        Method to call when "Delete" button is clicked. Deletes an album if selection is made, shows error dialog otherwise.

      • renameButtonClicked

        public void renameButtonClicked()
        Method to call when "Rename" button is clicked. Shows the rename album dialog if selection is made, shows error dialog otherwise.

      • openButtonClicked

        public void openButtonClicked()
        Method to call when "Open" button is clicked. Photo Window is started to open selected album, error dialog is shown if no album selected.

      • searchByDateClicked

        public void searchByDateClicked()
        Method to call when "Search" by Date button is clicked. Searches through all of user's photos, compiles a result album of photos that match the criteria. Photo window is started with the resulting album.

      • searchByTagClicked

        public void searchByTagClicked()
        Method to call when "Search" by Tag button is clicked. Searches through all of user's photos, compiles a result album of photos that match the criteria. Photo window is started with the resulting album.

      • logoutButtonClicked

        public void logoutButtonClicked()
        Method to call when "Logout" button is clicked. The Login window is started.

      • updateList

        public void updateList()
        Updates the list view with the current list of users.

      • getUser

        public User getUser()
        Returns the user.
        Returns:
        user to return

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.Object obj,
                 int index)
        Initializes the Album window given an object on first open. Populates the album list view to show all albums for the user.
        Specified by:
        init in class Controller
        Parameters:
        obj - User object that the Album window opened with.
        index -
